about_the_game:
Enjoy all 12 tracks of original music made for everyone's favorite game about adorably unclogging their sink! Composed by Dustin Morabito.

About Down the Drain:
Take a trip below the sink with Marta in this top-down 2D shooter through randomly generated mazes of pipes. Defeat gooey enemies, overcome strong bosses, and learn what's really going on when trouble starts brewing beneath our tubs and under our streets.
detailed_description:
Enjoy all 12 tracks of original music made for everyone's favorite game about adorably unclogging their sink! Composed by Dustin Morabito.

Take a trip below the sink with Marta in this top-down 2D shooter through randomly generated mazes of pipes. Defeat gooey enemies, overcome strong bosses, and learn what's really going on when trouble starts brewing beneath our tubs and under our streets.
name: Down the Drain Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 100 MB available space

short_description: Album containing all 12 original songs composed for Down the Drain.
